cast.overview: Recently deceased, a white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to console his bereft wife, only to find that in his spectral state he has become unstuck in time, forced to watch passively as the life he knew and the woman he loves slowly slip away.
cast.title: A Ghost Story
cast.character: Clara's Wife Who is Writing a Book

crew.original_title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
crew.overview: A young journalist in London becomes obsessed with a series of letters she discovers that recounts an intense star-crossed love affair from the 1960s.
crew.title: The Last Letter from Your Lover

details.biography:
Augustine Frizzell (born July 27, 1979) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter. She made her feature film directorial debut with Never Goin' Back (2018).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Augustine Frizzell, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Augustine Frizzell
